General.Name: Zhejiang JIULI Hi-tech Metals Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Jiuli Hi-Tech Metals Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells stainless steel pipes and tubes worldwide. It offers special alloy pipes, pipe fittings, flanges, bars, pipe prefabricated parts, seamless pipes, welded pipes, and composite pipes. The company's products oil and gas, chemical industry, electric power, aerospace, automotive, aviation industry, mining and construction industry, chemical industry, oil and gas, power, pulp and paper, household goods, electronics, and medical technology. Zhejiang Jiuli Hi-Tech Metals Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China.
